title: Payments made for gas shipments : PMD
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The President’s Media Division announced that necessary measures were taken to make payments for gas shipments.
Accordingly, the unloading and distribution of gas will be carried out from Thursday (17), the President’s Media Division stated.
Laugfs and Litro Gas announced on Wednesday (16) that they had suspended gas distribution due to a lack of US dollars.
Due to the current situation, a severe gas shortage has arisen island-wide.
